mapper.select:
select b.name name, prepaid_amt AS prepaidAmt, a.coins coins, charge_date AS chargeDate, type ,charge_method AS chargeMethod, coins_before AS coinsBefore, coins_after AS coinsAfter
,"-" dollName from t_member_charge_history a,t_member b where a.member_id=b.id
,c.`name` dollName from t_member_charge_history a,t_member b,t_doll c where a.member_id=b.id and a.doll_id =c.id and a.type = #{type}
,c.`name` dollName from t_member_charge_history a,t_member b,t_doll c where a.member_id=b.id and a.doll_id =c.id
and b.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and c.machine_code = #{machineCode}
and DATEDIFF(a.charge_date,#{chargeDate}) >= 0
ORDER BY a.charge_date desc
